Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:

Example 2:

forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

forall (l l' : list entry) (i : nat), sorted (l ++ l') -> i < maxIndex l' -> findGtIndex (l ++ l') i = l ++ findGtIndex l' i

Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope

sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
findGtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findGtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if i <? eIndex e then e :: findGtIndex es i else [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments findGtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
maxIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxIndex (entries : list entry) : logIndex := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eIndex e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex Arguments maxIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
findGtIndex_app_1 : forall (l l' : list entry) (i : nat), maxIndex l' <= i -> findGtIndex (l ++ l') i = findGtIndex l i
thing2 : forall (l l' : list entry) (i : nat), l <> [] -> Prefix l l' -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> l ++ removeAfterIndex l' i = l'
maxIndex_app : forall l l' : list entry, maxIndex (l ++ l') = maxIndex l \/ maxIndex (l ++ l') = maxIndex l' /\ l = []
prefix_contiguous : forall (l l' : list entry) (e : entry) (i : nat), l' <> [] -> Prefix l' l -> sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e > i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' i -> In e l'
findGtIndex_app_in_2 : forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (e : entry), sorted (l1 ++ l2) -> In e l2 -> exists l' : list entry, findGtIndex (l1 ++ l2) (eIndex e) = l1 ++ l' /\ Prefix l' l2
in_app_iff : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ l') < -> In a l \/ In a l'
removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient' : forall (x : nat) (l l' : list entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l 0 -> (forall e : entry, In e l' -> 0 < eIndex e) -> x <= maxIndex l -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l -> In e l') -> removeAfterIndex l' x = removeAfterIndex l x

findGtIndex_nil : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat), (forall e' : entry, In e' l -> eIndex e' <= i) -> findGtIndex l i = []
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_commute : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : logIndex), sorted l -> removeAfterIndex (findGtIndex l i) i' = findGtIndex (removeAfterIndex l i') i
NoDup_Permutation : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), NoDup l -> NoDup l' -> (forall x : A, In x l <-> In x l') -> Permutation l l'
removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient : forall (x : nat) (l l' : list entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l -> In e l') -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l' -> In e l) -> removeAfterIndex l' x = removeAfterIndex l x

contiguous_app : forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (i : nat), sorted (l1 ++ l2) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (l1 ++ l2) i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l2 i
Permutation_cons_inv : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), Permutation (a :: l) (a :: l') -> Permutation l l'
thing : forall (es l l' : list entry) (e e' : entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> entries_match l l' -> es <> [] -> Prefix es l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es (eIndex e) -> In e l -> In e' l' -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> es ++ removeAfterIndex l (eIndex e) = l'

Inductive Permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := perm_nil : Permutation [] [] | perm_skip : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> Permutation (x :: l) (x :: l') | perm_swap : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Permutation (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l) | perm_trans : forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> Permutation l l'' Arguments Permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments perm_nil _%type_scope Arguments perm_skip [A]%type_scope _ [l l']%list_scope Arguments perm_swap [A]%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments perm_trans [A]%type_scope [l l' l'']%list_scope

index_in_bounds : forall (e : entry) (es : list entry) (i : nat), sorted es -> In e es -> i <> 0 -> i <= eIndex e -> 1 <= i <= maxIndex es
findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
maxIndex_removeAfterIndex_le : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex), sorted l -> maxIndex (removeAfterIndex l i) <= maxIndex l
app_nil_r : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l ++ [] = l
removeAfterIndex_sorted : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex), sorted l -> sorted (removeAfterIndex l i)
in_or_app : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a l \/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m)
maxIndex_is_max : forall (l : list entry) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> maxIndex l >= eIndex e
execute_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix execute_log' (log : list entry) (st : data) (l : list (input * output)) {struct log} : list (input * output) * data := match log with | [] => (l, st) | e :: log' => let '(o, st') := handler (eInput e) st in execute_log' log' st' (l ++ [(eInput e, o)]) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> data -> list (input * output) -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope _ _%list_scope
app_cons_in : forall (A : Type) (l xs : list A) (a : A) (ys : list A), l = xs ++ a :: ys -> In a l
entries_match_append : forall (xs ys es : list entry) (ple : entry) (pli : nat) (plt : term), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> sorted es -> entries_match xs ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (pli <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = pli /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) -> (forall i : nat, pli < i <= maxIndex es -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e es) -> (forall e : entry, In e es -> pli < eIndex e) -> findAtIndex xs pli = Some ple -> eTerm ple = plt -> pli <> 0 -> entries_match (es ++ removeAfterIndex xs pli) ys
